member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.RedirectDebugLogs
member.summary: Redirect Debug Logs of the game to the console.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.SkipIntro
member.summary: Skip the EndNight intro.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.MutedSounds
member.summary: List of sounds that should be muted.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.ToggleConsoleKey
member.summary: Key used to toggle the in-game console.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.DontAutoAddScenes
member.summary: Indicates whether additional scenes should not be added automatically.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.DontLoadSaves
member.summary: Indicates whether the game should skip the activation process and not load saves.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.ActivateWorldObjects
member.summary: Indicates whether world objects such as trees, bushes, and rocks should be activated or not.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.PlayerDebugSpeed
member.summary: Multiplier for the speed of the player in the test world.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.SkipBuildingAnimations
member.summary: Indicates whether building animations should be skipped.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.EnableBowTrajectory
member.summary: Indicates whether the bow trajectory should be displayed when aiming.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.NoConsumeAnimation
member.summary: Whether to not play any animations when consuming items.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.NoAutoEquipStones
member.summary: Don't automatically equip stones when picking them up.

member.name: P:SonsGameManager.Config.InstantInventoryOpen
member.summary: Instantly open the inventory without animations.

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.ToggleGrassCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Toggles the visibility of grass

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.LogSoundsCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Log sounds to the console

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.FreecamCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Freecam mode without "exiting" the player

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.CancelBlueprintsCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Cancel all blueprints in a radius

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.NoForestCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Removes trees, bushes and (including billboards) for debugging purposes

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.ClearPickupsCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Clears all pickups in a radius

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.GoToPickup(System.String)
member.summary: Go to a pickup by name (picks the first one that contains the name). Useful for finding story items.

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.GoTo(System.String)
member.summary: Go to a coordinate, goto-location or gameobject.

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.DumpCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Dump various data from the game. dump [items, characters, prefabs]

member.name: M:SonsGameManager.Core.ToggleShadowsCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Toggles the shadow rendering (Shadows, Contact Shadows, Micro Shadowing)
